sourcesContent:
<template>
    <md-card id="search-container">
        <md-card-content class="flex">
             <md-field>
                <md-icon>flight_takeoff</md-icon>
                <label>From</label>
                <md-input></md-input>
            </md-field>
            
            <md-datepicker v-model="departDate" md-immediately>
                <label>Depart</label>
            </md-datepicker>
        
            <md-datepicker v-model="returnDate" md-immediately>
                <label>Return</label>
            </md-datepicker>

            <md-button id="search-button" class="md-dense md-raised md-primary">Search</md-button>

        </md-card-content>
    </md-card>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        name: 'SearchControls',
        props: [],
        data: () => ({
            departDate: new Date(),
            returnDate: new Date(new Date().getTime() + 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000)
        })
    }
</script>

<style scoped>
    #search-container {
        position: absolute;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        top: 20px;
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7)
    }
    #search-button {
        margin: auto 0 auto 20px;
    }
    .flex {
        display: flex;
    }
    .md-card-content:last-of-type {
        padding-bottom: 16px;
    }
    .md-field.md-theme-default>.md-icon:after {
        background-color: unset;
    }
</style>
